com.jme3.scene.plugins.blender.animations
Class ArmatureHelper

java.lang.Object
  com.jme3.scene.plugins.blender.AbstractBlenderHelper
      com.jme3.scene.plugins.blender.animations.ArmatureHelper

public class ArmatureHelper
extends AbstractBlenderHelper

This class defines the methods to calculate certain aspects of animation and armature functionalities.

Nested Class Summary

          This class holds the data needed later for bone transformation calculation and to bind parent with children.

Constructor Detail

ArmatureHelper

public ArmatureHelper(java.lang.String blenderVersion)
This constructor parses the given blender version and stores the result. Some functionalities may differ in different blender versions.

Parameters:
blenderVersion - the version read from the blend file
Method Detail

getBoneOMA

public java.lang.Long getBoneOMA(Bone bone)
This method returns the old memory address of a bone. If the bone does not exist in the blend file - zero is returned.

Parameters:
bone - the bone whose old memory address we seek
Returns:
the old memory address of the given bone

                                                                                 BlenderContext blenderContext)
                                                                          throws BlenderFileException
This method returns a map where the key is the object's group index that is used by a bone and the key is the bone index in the armature.

Parameters:
poseStructure - a bPose structure of the object
Returns:
bone group-to-index map
Throws:
BlenderFileException - this exception is thrown when the blender file is somehow corrupted

readBoneAndItsChildren

public ArmatureHelper.BoneTransformationData readBoneAndItsChildren(Structure boneStructure,
                                                                    ArmatureHelper.BoneTransformationData parent,
                                                                    BlenderContext blenderContext)
                                                             throws BlenderFileException
This method reads the bone with its children.

Parameters:
boneStructure - a structure containing the bone data
parent - the bone parent; if null then we read the root bone
blenderContext - the blender context
Returns:
the bone transformation data; contains bone chierarchy and the bone's matrices
Throws:
BlenderFileException - this exception is thrown when the blender file is somehow corrupted

buildBonesStructure

public Bone[] buildBonesStructure(java.lang.Long armatureOMA,
                                  Matrix4f additionalRootBoneTransformation)
This method creates the whole bones structure. Assignes transformations to bones and combines children with parents.

Parameters:
armatureOMA - old memory address of bones' armature object
additionalRootBoneTransformation - additional bone transformation which indicates it's mesh parent and armature object transformations
Returns:
